name: Dice Monster
description:
Choose your starter monster, explore, capture and be the strongest Dice Master!

Welcome to Dice Monster World!

World where you can capture and command your monsters using dice!

- Play by choosing your starter dice monster

- Capture and collect more than 100 dice monsters!

- Level up and evolve your dice monster!

- Use element effectivity (Water->Fire->Earth->Thunder, Light<->Dark)

- Find all rare dice monsters that spread across all stages 

- Choose your own path to meet the Dice Leader boss on each area!

- Combine several power ups, beat all enemies, and makes your team invincible!

*Currently on progress development, please expect some minor bugs.
